activities.name: GetFileList
activities.description: Get file list from processing container

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select DISTINCT DS_FILENAME FROM dwh.STG_ENTITY_VALID;
SELECT 1;

SELECT  1 AS  CNT FROM (
 select   DS_FILENAME from [dwh].[STG_COMPANY_ERROR_LOG]
 UNION 
 SELECT   DS_FILENAME from [dwh].[STG_WAREHOUSE_ERROR_LOG]
 UNION 
 SELECT   DS_FILENAME from [dwh].[STG_CONTACT_ERROR_LOG]
 ) A

select DISTINCT DS_FILENAME FROM dwh.STG_PRODUCTS_VALID;
SELECT 1;

select DISTINCT DS_FILENAME, COMPANYCR FROM dwh.STG_CR_TRANSACTION_TYPE_VALID;
SELECT 1;

properties.description: To create the tables on DWH database based on dwl_copy_table_list table
To create the tables on DWH database based on dwl_copy_table_list table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select * from  etl.dwl_copy_table_list
 where
  TARGET_TABLE_NAME IN (
'CompanyEntityTransactionTypes'
,'CompanyEntities'
,'TransactionTypes'
)

properties.description: To create the tables on DWH database based on dwl_copy_table_list table
